Reviews.Title: “Sleep, Park and fly, great deal for travelers!”

Reviews.Content: staying quality hotel especially morning flight leaving montreal airport traffic montreal horrendous times mornings trying cross island bridges etc sent clients mine hotel clean comfortable include amenities free wifi etc food moderately priced restaurant bar usually accommodating rates decent considering montreal hotel situated near montreal international airport cote de boulevard hotel shuttle service airport punctual operating 24 hours day half hour hotel found drivers helpful pickups return flights luggage handling etc park package traveler hotel offers special park fly rate packages travelers book night hotel opportunity leave vehicles hotels term parking periods 2 weeks parking secure attendants gates option park inside heated 3000 wash vehicle parked secure outside cost night including 1 week parking free shuttles etc total cost 17900 cdn bad deal considering normal cost parking vehicle airport week stay airport marriot hotel connected airport cost double total amount consider quality hotel instead

Reviews.Title: “Worst customer service, and overall experience, of any hotel”

Reviews.Content: stuck airport sent hotel nice front desk staff rude especially woman kept hold 11 minutes tried wake call smoking requested nonsmoking stunk secondly guest screamed fought husband night leading call police despite haunted screams help pounding doors reach front desk time screaming keeping weird lastly couldnt worse overcharged credit card dinner 10 bucks awarded using airline voucher altogether terrible service experience ive 20 traveling please money people deserve respect guest
